argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspprvacl.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspprvacl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspprvacl.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspprvacl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lspprvacl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 6 |  | lspprvacl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_lspprcl | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_lspprid1 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_lspprid2 | |- ( ph -> Y e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 7 | #P_lssvacl | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) /\ Y e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) |
